name: HOVERON
description:
This game is still in active development. This means that nothing is final and many changes are going to be made.

Please provide feedback on stuff that feels wrong/bad, but also provide feedback on the things that feel good and right. 

Planned features:
Being able to pause the game and change settings from ingame instead of just main menu
More enemy types
More interesting waves
Score combo system
Achievements
Upgrades (Projectile move speed, projectile turn speed, player movespeed, extra HP(?))
Cosmetic unlocks
Bosses?

If you have any other feature suggestions, please let me know.
